text: Princess Juliana International Airport is the main airport on the Caribbean island of Saint Martin/Sint Maarten. The airport is located on the Dutch side of the island, in the country of Sint Maarten.sxmairport.com: Annual Report 2015, visited 2 March 2016 It is named after Queen Juliana. The airport has very low-altitude flyover landing approaches. One end of its runway is extremely close to the shore and Maho Beach. ==References== Category:Sint Maarten Category:Airports in North America
title: Princess Juliana International Airport
